original_title: Indian flight lands at BIA due to bombs scare; search underway
original_body_lines: An Indian passenger flight from Mumbai has made an emergency landing at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) in Katunayake due to a bomb scare.

All 96 passengers and 08 crew members of the flight have been evacuated and a special search operation is being carried out in the aircraft at the BIA, Sri Lanka’s Police Spokesman DIG Nihal Thalduwa said.
